msbt.message: I bet you've caught lots more bugs than I have, .I do OK sneaking up on them, but sometimes I swing my net too soon, or hit the bug and scare it away! I'm just so impressed by anyone with your net skills, !
You know that Flick will buy any bugs you can catch, right?It's true! He'll buy bugs from pretty much anyone. Sometimes I wonder what he does with all those bugs
The tournament ends at six o'clock tonight, but you can exchange your points for prizes until eight o'clock!
I've been practicing with my net all week for the Bug-Off today! Good luck if you're competing!
Have you been out bug-catching? Hope you're having better luck at it than I am. I'm so clumsy sometimes!
